data.name: Rogue Masters
data.detailed_description:
A civilization that lacks Willpower is doomed to collapse against Entropy, the force responsible for corrupting the universe. Cooperate with up to 6 warriors and use your Willpower to fight against waves of increasingly stronger creatures until you reach the Champion of Entropy, an extremely powerful foe you’ll prove your worth against.



  • Fight Entropy with up to 6 players in a horde survival gameplay against increasingly powerful enemies.
  • Choose the right weapons for each situation and master the souls-like combat.
  • Build your character through a wide variety of equipments to suit your playstyle.
  • Customize your appearance through an extensive transmogrification system.
  • Offline solo mode available so you can play however you want.
  • NO microtransactions - everything is acquired through gameplay.
data.about_the_game:
A civilization that lacks Willpower is doomed to collapse against Entropy, the force responsible for corrupting the universe. Cooperate with up to 6 warriors and use your Willpower to fight against waves of increasingly stronger creatures until you reach the Champion of Entropy, an extremely powerful foe you’ll prove your worth against.



  • Fight Entropy with up to 6 players in a horde survival gameplay against increasingly powerful enemies.
  • Choose the right weapons for each situation and master the souls-like combat.
  • Build your character through a wide variety of equipments to suit your playstyle.
  • Customize your appearance through an extensive transmogrification system.
  • Offline solo mode available so you can play however you want.

data.short_description: Rogue Masters is a 6 player co-op horde survival game with souls-like combat and extensive character customization where you fight Entropy in long-lost civilizations.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Equivalent.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
